name: Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle - Chapter III: "Legal Stage"
summary: Race for justice in this anime-themed graphic adventure game! Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle - Chapter III: "Legal Stage" is the third release in the episodic NALE series. This has now been delisted for anyone who doesn't already own it; the content of this game was rolled into the collected release "Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle, Season One".
